Summary: Bright light hovering over Boulder and then slowly descending over foothills.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving West on Highway 36 into Boulder, Colorado and I noticed a bright white light hovering above the city. It appeared to have multiple lights clustered together as a single unit (large light on top and two smaller lights on bottom). I thought that it looked strange and it didn't have blinking lights and was larger than a helicopter would have been at my distance (approx a couple miles). The object appeared hazy. It hovered in the same spot for about 4 minutes, and then slowly moved down towards the foothills. I called my wife to tell her to look out of our back door to see if she could see it, but it was already out of her line of sight. I couldn���t tell whether or not the light actually went behind or in front of the flatirons before it finally went out of sight as I drove through town.
